DataElement.preferredName: Person Health Care Provider Discussion Potential For Reproduction Survey Detail Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Survey response to a question about whether or not a person has discussed their ability to have children after cancer treatment with a health care provider. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Health Care Provider Discussion Potential For Reproduction
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care._An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.:The likelihood or possibility that a specific state or condition will exist or that an action will occur._The reason of something._The generation of offspring by living organisms.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities, or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.:An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.

Concepts.definition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.
An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.

Property.preferredDefinition: The likelihood or possibility that a specific state or condition will exist.:No Value Exists:Reproduction is the creation of one thing as a copy of, product of, or replacement for a similar thing.  It is commonly used in the context of biological reproduction and sex. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: The likelihood or possibility that a specific state or condition will exist or that an action will occur.
The generation of offspring by living organisms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2023.7.21 Updated def for 'No Value Exists'. ak

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Yes, health care provider brought up topic
The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.:Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.
Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
